contentrichtext.text: [[File:Cuarta internacional.png|thumb|Logo of the Fourth International]] The '''Trotskyst Fraction – Fourth International''' ({{lang-es|Fracción Trotskysta - Cuarta Internacional}}) is a [[Trotskyist]] international organization. It was formed by the Argentine PTS and the Mexican LTS which split from the [[Nahuel Moreno]]'s [[International Workers League (Fourth International)]]. It consists of the following organisations: *[[Socialist Workers' Party (Argentina)]] (Partido de los Trabajadores Socialistas, PTS) from [[Argentina]] *[[League of Workers for Socialism]] (Liga de Trabajadores por el Socialismo - Contracorriente, LTS-CC) from [[Mexico]] *[[Revolutionary Workers League - Fourth International]] (Liga Obrera Revolucionaria - Cuarta Internacional, LOR-CI) from [[Bolivia]] *[[Revolutionary Strategy League - Fourth International]] (Liga Estratégia Revolucionária, LER-QI) from [[Brazil]] *[[Class Against Class]] (Partido de los Trabajadores Revolucionarios - Clase contra Clase, PTR-CcC) from [[Chile]] *[[League of Workers for Socialism]] (Liga de los Trabajadores Socialistas, LTS) from [[Venezuela]] *[[League of Revolutionary Socialists]] (Liga de la Revolución Socialista, LRS) from [[Costa Rica]] *[[Class Against Class]] (Clase contra Clase, CcC) from [[Spain]] They also have a website called FT Europe and appear to be associated with the Clear Tendency in the NPA in France. Also, the [[RIO Group]] has recently become a simpathising section. ==See also== *[[List of Trotskyist internationals]] ==External links== *[http://www.ft-ci.org/?lang=en Trotskyst Fraction] {{DEFAULTSORT:Trotskyst Fraction - Fourth International}} [[Category:Trotskyist political internationals]]
